short_summary: Supply rotary wing flight helmets with specified technical requirements
description: Establishing a contract for the supply of rotary wing flight helmets
full_summary:
===========

**Tender Title:** Rotary Wing Flight Helmets
--------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS4630263263-Doc4631805945
**Solicitation Number:** WS4630263263
**Publication Date:** June 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 29, 2024, at 2 p.m. (EDT)

**Definitions and Specifications:**

* UNSPSC Code: 46181700 (Face and Head Protection)
* Standard required: to be defined at Annex A

**Contract Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* Contract duration: to be confirmed

**Requirements:**

The Government of Canada invites qualified suppliers to participate in a request for proposal (RFP) to supply rotary wing flight helmets to the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan).

* The minimum order quantity is 10 helmets, with the option to purchase up to 20 helmets in total.
* The helmets must meet the technical requirements outlined in Annex A.
* The successful supplier will establish a contract with the PSPC for a period of two years, commencing on September 3, 2024.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical Merit: presented on a 0-30 scale
* Pricing: evaluated on a 0-20 scale
* Total score will be the combination of Technical Merit (30) and Pricing (20) on a scale of 0-50.

**Eligibility:**

* Suppliers must meet the requirements for trade agreements and areas of opportunity.

**Submission Instructions:**

* Proposals are to be submitted via the Ariba Discovery platform.
* Proposals must include a technical proposal, pricing information, and proof of eligibility to participate in trade agreements.

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact Mario Lafleur at mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or visit the notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19999226?extsite=MTk5OTkyMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Please note that this notice has expired, and responses will no longer be accepted.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA). Only suppliers who are eligible to participate in trade agreements are eligible to submit proposals.
